author: phil.eth
content:
Hey, I was just trying to set up my ssv node.
I am getting a segfault though:

```
2021/04/17 16:44:08 IP address is not accessibledial tcp XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX:YYYY: i/o timeout

panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x18 pc=0x123a801]

goroutine 1 [running]:
github.com/bloxapp/ssv/network/p2p.New(0x19a1a80, 0xc000044078, 0xc00059a240, 0xc000d77f40, 0x16a8632, 0x7, 0xc0000489f0, 0x30)
    /go/src/github.com/bloxapp/ssv/network/p2p/p2p.go:169 +0xba1
github.com/bloxapp/ssv/cli.glob..func3(0x2247a80, 0xc000d77ea0, 0x0, 0xa)
    /go/src/github.com/bloxapp/ssv/cli/node.go:133 +0x2cb1
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).execute(0x2247a80, 0xc000d77d60, 0xa, 0xa, 0x2247a80, 0xc000d77d60)
    /go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v1.1.1/command.go:854 +0x2c2
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).ExecuteC(0x2247540, 0x7, 0xc00099feff, 0xc000013d40)
    /go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v1.1.1/command.go:958 +0x375
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).Execute(...)
    /go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v1.1.1/command.go:895
github.com/bloxapp/ssv/cli.Execute(0x16a7951, 0x7, 0x16a6aa2, 0x6)
    /go/src/github.com/bloxapp/ssv/cli/cli.go:26 +0xdb
main.main()
    /go/src/github.com/bloxapp/ssv/cmd/ssvnode/main.go:16 +0x51
make: *** [Makefile:86: start-node] Error 2
```
My address on the custom ports is reachable though, checked it twice. The port mapping to the docker host is also correct.

author: alon.ssv.network
content: what you mean by custom port? did you open the necessary ports on your machine?

author: lior.ru
content: <@311126836371259402> this usually means your address is not properly exposed to the network, I'll dm you

author: phil.eth
content: Can't use 12000,13000 so changed tcp and udp port.

author: alon.ssv.network
content: We donâ€™t have port customization just yet, can you make it with the existing default ports?
